titleStmt.title: A Searious warning for all separated churches and church-members, against back-sliders. And a seasonable caveat to all their followers.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Ibbitson dwelling in Smithfield, neer Hosier Lane,

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copy: "Decemb. 22. 1652"; the '3' in the imprint has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
